values:
Hey you guys... im copying Jen Jen..... This is my new site:

http://www.freewebs.com/destroyedangel/

You know with each day that passes by, I pray to god I'll never forget who you are.
You mean everything to me.
I love you

I pray,
When it's time for me to say goodbye
I'll never forget looking in your eyes,
I pray,
That I feel your touch
And that God doesn't forget our love,
I pray,
When I close my eyes,
I can still see visions of you on my mind.
I pray,
That I see you in another life,
I pray that you still by my side.
Oh I pray.

--Amanda Perez

 

I love that song so much. Im sick. I stayed home today. Yeah, pretty fucked up, i know. Im feelin' a little bit better now. Haha.. i actually feel like dancin' right now. (dont ask)

Last night was really shitty. Worst part is... i dont remember what the hell happend. All i know is that i threw up.

I just wanted to let you guys know that im alive.

--B--

Only a week..... only a week

Hey whats goin down? Nothin here.... I just got home from school.

Today was EXTREMELY interesting. To start, we had a fire drill 3 minutes into 2nd period. So we all went outside. I found Shar, so her and I were talking to Colton. God that kid is halarious. Him and I were talking, and he said that he was Bi, and he has a boyfriend. U know what the first thing that came to my mind was? (besides DAMN i wish i were that guy) I FOUND A NEW GAY FRIEND!!! Lol, i was talking to chrysti about it... we're gonna go steal him. Then when we were comming in from the Firedrill, colton bumped into me and was all "god, watch where your going, slut" so i said "Fuck you! you... you... you WHORE!" omg... we were laughing soooo incredibly hard.

Haha.. good times. Then what else happened?? At lunch Chrysti took her ambien. (she thinks that she gets high off 'em) No she doesnt.... but ya know, whatever. To humor her i pretend. So she gave me the other half... and she TOTALLY thinks that this shit works...so i was acting kinda funny... just ta make her happy. Larry was givin me alot of shit about how im going to ruin my life by doing all those drugs.untill i told him that it was just a half a sleepy pill, and im acting funny just to humor Chrysti. Then he was like oh.... nevermind. o0o0o then guess what else happened!! I told Larry about how much i've been crushin' over Eric.... yes, Larry is like waaay tight with Eric. ^_^ Ya'll know what that means..... BRANDO'S GONNA GET HOOKED UP!!!
YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAY!!!!!!!!!!

SKyler got arrested yesterday. No body has heard from him yet, not even his own brother. He got caught smoking. (it was bound to happen eventually) I hope he doesnt get any too serious charges brought up against him.

Okay.. theres this one girl in like.... i dunno... toooo many of my classes. She is totally retarded. If your a girl, she'll call you little sister. and if your a boy, your little brother. yes... broTHER sisTER. She sounds like fuckin cracker. Sorry, i couldnt hold in my irritation any longer! Weeellll... Im going to go take a nap or soemthing. I'll write more later!

-*-B-*-

So Today sucked a fairly large dick. I think i started it out in a bad mood. I just didnt get enough sleep. Then i kept dropping my stuff all day, and tripping and stuff. I was just having an off day today.

I didnt get to talk to Colton that much. Tomorrow should be better.... i have 3 hours with him in the morning. :-D yay. I love my A days. There so much more... lets say "eventfull".

Okay, so everyone knows that J and i are currently Broken up right? right. Well if shes plannin' on makin' a move again, she better hurry before the chance passes her by.

So anyways. Guess what i did? I repierced my bellybutton. Last night i found out that the hole wasnt fully closed, so i put my earing in it. Then Today while i was taking a bath, the hole looked like it kind of stretched a litlte. So i just took an earing off my ear and put it in. So my bellybutton is now repierced. Bellybutton ring and all. Im happy about that. I look soo much better with it peirced.

Dinner time, im out.

-*-B-*-

When the rain would fall down
I just stared out my window
Dreaming of what could be
And if I'd end up happy
I would pray

I cut my hair yesterday. Its really short in the back.... and a little longer in the front. I like it. Im sure that Janice'll hate it, but thats too bad, it had to be done. HaHa... that was my "im single" act. Im sure that it'll actually grow quite a bit before the wedding. After this im going to just let it grow right down to my ass. I dont care what anyone else wants. Thats what i want. Its kind of what i've always wanted.... 8th grade was the closest that i've had to it.

I've been talking to SImone alot more. It makes me really really happy. I've missed her and machaela sooo bad since all of that shit happend.... right now i really need some stability in my life. I feel so.... Lost. Lost is the closest word that i can find to how I've been feeling lately. Which is weird, because I actually have been feeling more like i belong here lately. School starting was a blessing in disguise. But when it comes to my Family, Everyone that i love, and my life in general, im blind in a forrest. Im 15. Within the next year I'll be able to drive.In the next 2 years i'll be able to smoke. In the next 3 years I'll be able to Vote, and I'll be out on my own. I feel overwhelmed and alone already. I have to start thinking about money, cars, College. I feel like a little kid at a carnaval... all of the lights and sounds taking over my senses... so excited to go on the rides... but still so scared. I WISH i was 4 again... runnin' around the house.... jumping into my dads arms...My mom rocking me in the big brown chair. Fuck that carnival shit. I feel like im drowning.... watching all the other kids with their floaties, but i have none. THATS what i feel like. God i need stability. Tho i guess that not too many teenagers have any right now.

Schools tomorrow... ima go catch up on some good 'ol R&R while i still can.

Love to all,

Brandon

So i've been outside working all day... I guess that we are trying to get our house refinanced. Some inspector dude is going to come on Monday. So my parents are runnin' around like chickens with their heads cut off. Its a sight to see. My poor mom did the check book yesterday....... i went upstairs and found her drinking wine and cutting her hair. we only let her have 2 glasses.... but it really makes me worried about money. I know my dad makes a DAMN good living... but all that fucking debt that my parents have from their credit cards is just eatin' us alive.

My mom cleaned my floors today.... lol... she got all those damn coke stains out of my carpet from this last summer. That shit was EVERYWHERE!! It was pretty nasty. I hope that we get this loan or whatever it is. Not being able to buy food kinda sucks. So lets see... what did i do? I power washed the patio... that was interesting.... i had to go over it like... 3 times. then i washed all of the screens. My dad is goin' to clean out my little window wells for me. Im soo happy!!! then i wont have to be afraid to open my windows when it rains.

Yesterday sucked. It is to never be spoken of again. Never ever never.

Alrighty, Im bored as shit. Theres nothing to do... ima go take a nice hot bubble bath..... o0o0o!! with candles! THATS what i need.... some time to just think.

I'm out.

Love, Brandon

Im sorry guys, I know that everyone hates reading lyrics.... but this is how i feel right now.... it needs to be read.

i am heaven sent,
don't you dare forget.
i am all you've ever wanted,
what all the other boys all promised.
sorry i told. i just needed you to know.
i think in decimals and dollars.
i am the cause to all your problems,
shelter from cold. we are never alone.
coordinate brain and mouth.
then ask me whats it like to have
myself so figured out.
i wish i knew..

i hope this song starts a craze.
the kind of song that ignites the airwaves.
the kind of song that makes people glad
to be where they are,
with whoever they're there with.
this is war.
every line is about,
who i don't wanna write about anymore.
hope you come down with something
they can't diagnose, don't have the cure for.
holding on to your grudge.
oh its so hard to have someone to love.
and keeping quiet is hard.
cuz you cant keep a secret
if it never was a secret to start.
at least pretend you didn't wanna get caught..

we're concentrating on falling apart.
we were contenders, we're throwing the fight
i was just wanna believe, i just wanna believe,
i just wanna believe, in us.

Oh, we're so c-c-c-c-c-controversial.
we are entirely smooth.
we admit to the truth,
we are the best at what we do.
and these are the words you wish you wrote down.
this is the way you wish your voice sounds,
handsome and smart.
oh my tongue's the only muscle on my body
that works harder than my heart.
and its all from watching tv,
and from speeding up my breathing.
wouldnt stop if i could.
oh it hurts to be this good.
you're holding on to your grudge.
oh it hurts to always have to be honest
with the one that you love.
oh, so let it go..

we're concentrating on falling apart.
we were contenders, we're throwing the fight
i was just wanna believe, i just wanna believe,
i just wanna believe.
we're concentrating on falling apart.
we were contenders, we're throwing the fight
i was just wanna believe, i just wanna believe,
i just wanna believe, in us.

this is the grace that only we can bestow.
this is the price you pay for loss of control.
this is the break in the bend,
this is the closest of calls.
this is the reason your alone,
this is the rise and the fall.

we're concentrating on falling apart.
we were contenders, we're throwing the fight
i was just wanna believe, i just wanna believe,
i just wanna believe.
we're concentrating on falling apart.
we were contenders, we're throwing the fight
i was just wanna believe, i just wanna believe,
i just wanna believe, in us.

School was pretty good today... Nothin too interesting happened. We had an assembely, but I didnt go, I just stayed in the Lunch room... hung out with skyler, zach, and colton *Melts* We all just hung out and talked.... I talked to Colton quite a bit... hes a funny ass kid.... not to mention hot as hell too!!!!(hes a drummer..... yummy!!!!) lol. Then i had to go back to psychology, and i have psychology with him. We were sitting there smilin' and lookin at eachother the whole time...or as my mother would say "making googly eyes" lol... my moms a tard!

What else, what else.... I get to go to the wedding.... haha, i cant remember if I have notified everybody yet or not. Its going to be back in virginia.... yay!!!! I get to wear the dress that i was going to wear for my grandpa's wedding... it'll be fun. (I LOVE dressing up) only 15 days!!!o0o0o u know what that reminds me? Today Chrysti told me that she was actually born in North Carolina... she was an army brat. Isnt that awesome?!?! Lol... i totally never knew either.. crazy shit.

Hmmn... Im kind of frusterated... I cant seem to get Eric's attention quite as much as i would like. (hot "my husband" look alike) So i think that ima just concentrate on Colton for a while.....^_^.

Janice and I are kind of weird right now... i think. To be quite honest, i really dont know. its sooo bad! whenever i talk about her, i keep callin' her my girlfriend, not my ex. Yes, ima tard, i know. I even did it again TODAY when i was writing larry a note. Yes... larry... haha, i think i scared him off... he doesnt bug me at lunch anymore. Sounds like that dislocated shoulder served its purpose.

Tomorrow im going to strip some wallpaper in the bathrooms, so that i can earn a couple bucks to spend towards my piercing kit. YAY ^_^ i decided that ima do it the morning before i fly to VA. WHich reminds me... J, if your reading this, your daddy needs to send my daddy the itinerary for my flight. THANX babe!

Well, ima get going.... im probably gonna go shower or something... theres never anything to do after school.

LOVE TO ALL!!!

-*-B-*-

He smelt like alcohol. He gave me a hug. I told him that I was suicidal and he laughed. Here comes the dreaded 'D' word.

School has been okay i guess. Im already dying from lack of sleep. Lets see, I fell asleep in English, and ASL. Haha... Health i was too busy watchin some hottness.      :-P , same with Psychology. I actually ate lunch today tho.... that made me feel a little better... plus the fact that i talked to J up untill i got lunch. She got her braces off today. She says that she looks soo much prettier wtihout them... to be honest i probably wont even notice that they're gone when i see her. She always looks the same to me...amazing.

Chris still isnt here.... Last night i kept whinning that i missed him. Every five minutes i was like "how long till chris gets home??" Hes going to be the hardest to leave when i move out. I love him so much. I sure hope that he and i keep sucha close relationship for the rest of our lives. So i guess now i have a  little sister too... Jen Jen adopted me! Yay. Now i have everything that i could ever want. I love you jen jen!!!!!

Im still not exactly sure where J and I stand right now. Im pretty sure that im going to the wedding. Im excited about that... what, like 16 days untill i get to hang out with them?? i think so. im not sure. J and I kind of asked eachother what we were today. it was kind of funny. Seems like we're always in this uncomfortable in-between. Where deep down we know EXACTLY what we want the other one to say... but neither of us have the balls to say it. Its kind of funny how we get embarassed about stuff like that, but we can sit there and just be discusting infront of eachother... and LAUGH... and tell our deepest secrets, like its nothing.  Just like, she never sings infront of just me. Why? I dunno. Shes only done it once. "The worst is Over now, and we can breathe again" Just like i WONT dance infront of her... its not like im retarded at it either. i have alot of rhythm.... i just get all giggly... yes, i know we're stupid. ;-) Its just weird how that works. Honesty doesnt seem to come very easily between us either. Whatever

Ima go shower, and then sleep.

Later you guys

-*-B-*-
<U><FONT face=Verdana color=#000099 size=7>If there is one person you can't stop thinking about, post this same exact sentance in your journal.</FONT></U>

Im just about ready to up my ad dosage about to about 20 pills a day... lets see, what would that add up to...800 mgs. Would that Kill me? i know that taking 13 zoloft wont.

Whatever.. fuck it. Ijust wont go to school tomorrow.

Hey... look at that, my new eyeliner actually does hold up against tears fairly well.

im done, im going to go bathe in my tears.

So let me go, and you will find someone, here i go, scream my lungs out to try to get to you you are my only one...

Im going into work with my dad today, They're remodling something, and he wants to show me it. So... I GET COFFEE!! yay. I am excited. Then we're gonna go shopping for some stuff for chris's little camping trip with his class. I just need some eye liner and mascara.

But yes, CHristian gets to go to Mill hollow tomorrow with his class. THey get to stay in cabins and stuff. I dont want him to go.... He'll come back on wednesday. Thats soooooo long!!! im gonna miss him!!! (what the hell am i gonna do when i move out?! Im just going to have to make sure that he has a verizon cell phone so that i can call him whenever i want)

Ummm... Yesterday kinda sucked. I broke up with my girlfriend. Yah... but whatever. Ima be fine. Shit was just NOT working. We decided to still be friends tho. Regardless Im pretty sure that I get to go to Kevin and Rhonda's wedding. My dad brought it up in the car last night. So Im going to have him call Kevin, and figure out what he wants to do. I wasnt sure If J would still want me to come or not.... but I guess she does. It'll be fun.

Haha... I love Jen Jen!!! she is just the coolest little chick i know. For like Forever yesterday Jen was trying to play match maker and make Janice and I okay again. It was pretty halarious. "pardon my french, but you guys are FUCKING PISSING ME OFF!!!"-Jen I love her a ton. Shes like the cool little sister I never had. "shes over there singing I LOVE BRANDON YES I DO!" :-D I love you jen!

Well tomorrow i get to start my second week of school. Im just so happy right now.

Ima go get dressed and stuff. I'll write more later!!!

Hugs and kisses----B

Here I go, scream my lungs out and try to get to you
You are my only one
I let go, but there's just no one, no one like you
You are my only, my only one

Hey you guys...

GUESS WHAT!!! Right now im lookin for a place to go get my labre pierced!!! Isnt that awesome?!?! My mom wants me to go get it done. I hope that she actually fallows through with it this time.

Then soon as my dad gets paid ima go cut my hair short.... yAy!!!!!! Im excited

Later dudez--

B

Well... Pat is going to be spending the night tonight. It was really nice seeing Pat and Patti. They're sooo much fun. I had awesome talks with Both of them. They both offered that If i wanted to go to Idaho that I was more than welcome to stay with them.... Patti said that It could be neutral ground.... just incase Simone or Machaela ever wanted to see me again. Pat also has a ton of horses, and he said that A couple of friends and I are more than welcome out at his place to just hang out, ride horses or something, really whatever we wanted.. I love those guys so much. They are just awesome people.

I kind of talked to my dad a little bit about going to D-Day.... (the wedding) I approached him about it at dinner.... so that he couldnt freak out at me, since Patti and Pat were there.... I think that I got a little bit farther with the situation... *crosses fingers* i hope.

Well... J wants to call me, so i gotta get runnin'

Love to all

-*B*-

THE FIRST WEEK OF SCHOOL IS OVER!!!

I am sooo....Ecstatic. Yes, thats it. Im ecstatic. I went the WHOLE goddamned first week of school. NO second thoughts, NO panic attacks, NO faking sick, NOTHING. Just getting up like i should, getting ready, leaving, and going to school. Like a NORMAL kid. For those of you who know how it was before, arent you proud?!?!?! I've even been interacting with people.... I havnt been shy little depressed brandon. I've been talking, hanging out with people that i actually LIKE at lunch, answering questions in class, not being afraid of stupid shit. This is an event to be celebrated. Lol... Im a TaRd I know............ but isnt it just fuckin awesome?!?!

So what else is going on?? Uhhh... I think on wednesday night I came home and slept from 4 until 8:30... stayed up until 10:30, and then slept until 6:30 in the morning. It was nice, and DEFINATLY needed. This whole 'waking up early' idea is just killin' me. It'll be nice sleepin' in this weekend. SO Heres a WARNING: DONT CALL ME AND WAKE ME UP ANY EARLIER THAN 11!! Because (even if you do live in Idaho) I will not pause before runnin' up there and pinching you really really hard. LOL.

OMG OMG OMG  okay... get this..... Larry Foote. (some of you might remember him as that one fucker who is a violent prick) Yes, I think that I am his latest Infatuation. HA like that kid has a chance in hell! number one... UGLY... number two... PRICK number 3..... hes too full of himself to realize how much of a lowlife he is.  THis son of a bitch wanted a drink of my pop, but we were in the Library, and I didnt wanna get it taken away so i was like "No..." Larry was like "Just gimme a goddamned drink" I looked at his ugly ass and was like "well with that attitude you can kiss my ass" THen he wouldnt drop it, and he was being a fuckin immature little brat about it, and he said something that totally offended me, and i smacked his shoulder..... but he hit me back.... HARD. and i was all "didnt your mama teach you not to hit girls?!" then he like tapped my shoulder.... maybe he was thinkin he was funny or something? I dont know... and i was like "dude.... thats not a hit... retard" then he punched my left arm. and was like "does that count?" I fuckin turned around, and nailed him right in his shoulder.... and im wearing this huge fake diamond ring..... yah..... he just about fell on the floor. (pussy) Then he was whining and shit about it, and how bad it hurt, and how he thought that i had dislocated it. I was like... ya kno what? " 1. when i say no, i mean NO. 2. Dont you ever touch me again, it pisses me off...... this was NOTHING. DONT ever let it happen again" Next time that he does shit, he'll get it in the face.... it should leave a nice scar on both his ugly face, and dilusional ego.

So yes... that was pretty much the highlight of my day. Pat and Patti are going to stay the night tonight, and I need to go practice my sign language..... (im gettin good at it!!)

I'll write more later... HAVE A GOOD WEEKEND!!!!

I love you J!

-*-B-*-

Second day of school wasnt too bad. I just feel asleep too late last night, I couldnt keep my eyes open long enough to watch southpark... and it turned out to be a good one.... damnit.  Whatever, I was tired enough this morning. I woke up at 6:30... i must be gettin real good at gettin ready, it only took me a half an hour. haha... and I thought I was movin' slow. Drawing Just about killed me. Kaitlin and I were talking about how its sad when we're dreading Art. Its just too easy for the two of us. World History would've been a hell of alot better had i not been sleeping. Lol.... After I got my assignment done, we still had another 1/2 hour left. Both Ryan and I were trying our hardest to let the time fly. (we were hungry as shit) but it wouldnt! so i layed on my desk with my eyes closed, barely sleeping for a half an hour. It was nice. That combined with the pizza at lunch woke me up for Algebra and Chemistry. I had a shit load of Chemistry and Algebra homework. All J's doin is like playin' games and stuff.... lol, and im getting homework. So over all today wasnt all that bad.... besides being waaay too damn long. It really sucks when all of your classes are 1 1/2 hours long. Tomorrow wont be bad at all.... I have FUN classes tomorrow. I've got Sign Language, Psychology, Lunch, then English and Health. PLUS I dont have to carry numerous text books in my back pack all day.

There is a huge storm comming, I can feel it. My poor older dog pongo is freaking out. Storms really scare her. Which is totally weird, cuz they always calm me... OH! I gotta go open my windows. hold on. Alright, Im back, did you miss me? OF COURSE YOU DID! :-P But anyways......

 I am in such a good place mentally right now. Its actually really suprising. Even my dad has noticed lately. I figured that soon as school started i'd completely break down again. But I didnt. and I dont feel an extreme ammount of stress... no fear... nothin. Im even socializing! *gasp!* I know!!!! At lunch I've been hanging out, and I was even just playin around, and actin like the dork that i am at lunch. It was an awesome feeling. I havnt even been shy in the past two days. I'm talkative, and not afraid of people judging me. You guys are all like *sarcasm* OH YAY FOR BRANDON, SHE FIGURED OUT HOW TO BE NORMAL. But this is a super HUGE AMAZING thing for me.  I know that its only been 2 days, and it COULD go all down hill from here.... and it might. But im lookin' at school not as a hell hole that is only in my vocabulary so that i can graduate and leave. Now its like....... CHRYSTI! SKYLER! fun classes OTHER PEOPLE! You know who I have to thank for it? (haha, besides my meds, and my therapists and awesomely cool family) My baby girl. Im sure that I could have done this school shit on my own, and been happy with it, and made friends and shit.... but she made me complete.  Thank you baby girl. I love you.  Now all that I need to do is get my best friends back, and then my life will be PERFECT.  Well yes, Its just about time for me to go.... SImpsons are almost on, and im bored. haha. I'll Catch ya'll later!

 

Love always,

                         Brandon

Hey Everyone

Sorry about the post last night. I was a little messed up over school, and i was just in a vewy VEWY touchy mood. I appologize. I'd like to assure you that everything is all better now, and im all better now.

So. Today was my first official day of high school. I DIDNT GET LOST!! Arent you guys proud?? Well, i got a little turned around for a few seconds, but it was quickly solved . In my first Period (sign) Skylers in there with me! Im really happy that he is. So is my newest buddy Ryan. Uhhh... no body is in my Psyc. Class. But English (3) I have Skyler, Shar, Chrysti, and Larry.... yes, long story with Larry, ill esplain later. I dont have anyone in 4th with me. in Art (5) I have this one chick from my drawing class last year. We were making fun of how easy the class is going to be. OMG my Drawing Teacher looks like Martha Stewart!!! (but my teachers non-bitchyness led me to the conclusion that Martha Stewart ISNT hiding from the police in Utah) I have Ryan and Peggy in my 6th period, Larry(oh yay.... *eye roll*) and GEORGE!!! IM SOO HAPPY TO HAVE A CLASS WITH GEORGE!!! GEORGE IS THE BESTEST EVER!!! Lol..... I freaked when I saw him. Then for my chemistry class, they decided that I should be in Honors Chem. instead of applied Chemistry. Sounds good to me... my new teacher is nicer anyways. Hmmn... that about raps it up for the day. Tomorrow i have all my hard classes. It sucks not having a locker, i gotta carry around my books ALL day long.

Oh Yeah, By the way, I decided to create a Live Journal. My xanga got really boring. Plus with this one, i can change my text more than My stupid xanga. Sooo... if you dont like it, then please kiss my ass.

Ok, So with the whole Larry thing... hes this jack-off excuse for a guy. He thinks hes all big and bad, and hes just an adverage-insecure-asshole. I think im his new obsession. But no thanks.... Im not lookin for love, i already found it. Bsides, Im not lookin for love with some Ballsack who beats his girlfriends. Jesus..... Ima tell Skyler to switch me seats so that I dont have to sit next to him. He makes me uncomfortable.

Well I need to go take a shower and relax a little. I hope that everyone else had a good day, and i hope to hear about it soon!!!!!

Love you all-

B
No Matter how hard I try, I cant ever seem to win. FINE. SHE WON. SHE HOLDS YOUR HEART. I dont even want it anymore. It hurts too much.
